channel.title: How do I add skull in pk area
channel.description: I have a pk server but there's not a skull in all the pk areas could somebody make me a little tut on how to do this, thanks.

item.title: How do I add skull in pk area
item.dc:creator: @egor42 egor42
item.description:
@egor42 wrote:

Use .Kaboom (The Wise Guy)'s, his is what you were asking for.
Ye .. maybe it will not work because it is from testscape..or other sources.. then try another

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add skull in pk area
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:3, topic:85248”]You can only delete it if you have it. -.- And unless you’re using Phonescape V1/2 you won’t have it, I beleive it’s an interface… Anyway, I don’t know the answer to this. Sorry.

Heres my skull, you could try adding it : public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false; public void WriteWildyLevel() { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@whi@[SERVER NAME HERE]", 199); }

If you don’t know where to add it, tell me and I’ll explain.

Edit : I was wrong, it’s a frame. Interfaces are things like the tabs I think. Anyway, got any problems with adding it?[/quote]
I mean like in places like varrok we can pk I want to add a skull there, my server already has that code.

Read full topic

item.source: How do I add skull in pk area

item.title: How do I add skull in pk area
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Search for public void WriteWildyLevel()

Then add this { checkwildy2(); if(inwildy2 && !nonWild()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@Wild", 199); leftwild = 1; } else if(nonWild() && inwildy2 && leftwild == 1) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@gre@Safe", 199); } }

So it looks like this

public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false; public void WriteWildyLevel() { checkwildy2(); if(inwildy2 && !nonWild()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@Wild", 199); leftwild = 1; } else if(nonWild() && inwildy2 && leftwild == 1) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@gre@Safe", 199); } }

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add skull in pk area
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

You can only delete it if you have it. -.- And unless you’re using Phonescape V1/2 you won’t have it, I beleive it’s an interface… Anyway, I don’t know the answer to this. Sorry.

Heres my skull, you could try adding it : public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false; public void WriteWildyLevel() { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@whi@[SERVER NAME HERE]", 199); }

If you don’t know where to add it, tell me and I’ll explain.

Edit : I was wrong, it’s a frame. Interfaces are things like the tabs I think. Anyway, got any problems with adding it?
